dialogues: Ebenezer: Hello, miss, you… are the manager of this place, correct?
Kaitlyn: Manager? You serious? I. own. it!
Ebenezer: It regrets me to inform you that there’s been a murder.
Kaitlyn: …what? You’re kidding, right? Ugh. Do I have to call the police?
Ebenezer: No I’m quite serious I’m afraid.
Ebenezer: But I have it under control.
Ebenezer: If you wouldn’t mind, could you tell me what you know about my fellow visitors?
Kaitlyn: I suppose, who do you want to know about?
